org.orgName: United States District Court for the Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: IN THE UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON. NORTHERN DIVISION.
IN THE MATTER OF THE PETITION OF FRANCIS STEPHEN Medcraf FOR A WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS. No. 3038

Comes now Robert Hodge, as Sheriff of King County,Washington, and repsondent in the above entitled proceeding, and for his return to the writ of habeas corpus heretofore served upon him, shows to this court the following facts:

That he is now detaining in his custody the above named petitioner, Francis Stephen Medcraf, under and by virtue of a Commitment Upon Sentence, issued by Reah M. Whitehead, Justice of the Peace in and for King County, State of Washington, sitting in Seattle Precinct, for the imprisonment of said Francis Stephen Medcraf in the county jail, in default of the payment of a fine of Fifty dollars and costs, duly imposed upon said Francis Stephen Medcraf by said Reah M. Whitehead, Justice of the peace, as aforesaid, on the 2nd day of June, 1915, a copy of which Commitment Upon Sentence is hereto attached and made a part hereof.
I herewith produce the body of the petitioner in court with this return.
Alfred H Lundin Attorney for Respondent.
